price: Wͻkaa sε: “Wobaa yεn hͻ sε worebεdane y’ani afiri yɛn abosom no so? Sε woyε nokwafoͻ ampa a, εnneε ma deε wode hyε yεn bͻ (hunahuna yεn) no mmra yεn so”.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā litafikanā ʿan ālihatinā fatinā bimā taʿidunā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
